name: 蘇昱瑋
objective:
介紹計算機基本架構，硬體，軟體，程式設計，Algorithms 及組合語言程式。
This course will focus on: basic structure of computer; applied; software﹝Office97, Lotus123…﹞; program design; algorithms and visual basic program.
schedule:
week 1~2: Introduction, Array Operations
week 3~4: Structured Programming and Functions
week 5~6: Plotting
week 7~8: Graphical User Interface
week 9: Midterm exam
week 10~11: Image Processing
week 12~13: Integration and Differentiation
week 14~15: Root Finding, Linear Equations
week 16~17: Statistics, Analysis, Curve Fitting
week 18: final exam
